incidents.name: Elevated 500 Errors in Multiple Twilio Products

incident_updates.body: All Intelligence and Transcriptions that were recoverable have been recovered. Programmable Voice Recording and Intelligence services are operating normally at this time.

Engineers have recovered all recordings that were impacted by the incident (those from approximately 7:00 AM PT to 9:31 AM PT on 5 October 2023) and able to be recovered. Intelligence and Transcriptions have been partially recovered and engineers continue working to ensure all impacted requests have been recovered. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Intelligence and Transcriptions have been partially recovered and engineers continue working to ensure all impacted requests have been recovered. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with billing. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Elevated 5xx Error on Twilio API Calls

incident_updates.body: Twilio API was degraded for 3 minutes between 1:28:20 till 1:31:40 PST on 10/06/2023. During that period, customer may have experienced elevated 5xx error rate on their API calls. This issue has now been resolved.

incidents.name: Automated Alert: No Customer Impact

incident_updates.body: We have fully investigated the elevated 500 errors in multiple Twilio products triggered by our automated alert, and it was determined that they're related to the existing StatusPage post at https://status.twilio.com/incidents/9z5mdhxc05d0. Please continue to look for additional updates in that active post.

We are currently investigating an elevated rate of 500 errors in Proxy, Studio, Flex, Voice, Conversations, Messaging channels as WhatsApp, Facebook and Google conversations. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Messaging. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Video Insights Room Summaries for Rooms Unavailable on Twilio Console

incident_updates.body: Twilio Video Insights room summaries for rooms were degraded for 39 hours and 40 minutes between 23:00 on 09/26/2023 and 14:40 on 09/26/2023 Pacific Time. During this period, a subset of video insights room summaries for rooms are not accessible through the Video Insights console dashboard. The issue has now been resolved.
